casebody.data:
John A. BRYANT, Libelant-Appellant, v. UNITED STATES of America, Respondent-Appellee. No. 309. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. April 6, 1936. Lucien V. Axtell, of New York City (Frederick H. Cunningham, of New York City, of counsel), for libelant. *1002Lamar Hardy, U. S. Atty., and Tompkins, Boal & Tompkins, all of New York City (Arthur M. Boal, of New York City, of counsel), tor the United States.

Before MANTON, L. HAND, and SWAN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed.
